channel.title: How do i add requirments for Skill Capes?
channel.description: I have a client called CSK and it has the new skillcape models added... BUT they take over the Clue Scrolls... Does anyone know how to make the real requirments for the "Clue Scrolls"? Like 99 Defence for the Defence cape?

item.description:

I have a client called CSK and it has the new skillcape models added… BUT they take over the Clue Scrolls… Does anyone know how to make the real requirments for the “Clue Scrolls”? Like 99 Defence for the Defence cape?
